name: Shimmering peace.
description:
By Vlas Belov. 2022
The symbol of peace turns into a symbol of war.
AR Digital kinetic sculpture created in VR Oculus Medium, animation in Blender. Interactive 3D sculpture (glb), GIF title image 1080/1080. You can see in AR if you go to this page from your smartphone and press the AR button in the corner.
